response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, we are confident that it will be an invaluable asset to your organization. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive opportunity is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
